text: 2.4: Jer 11.20; Ga 1.10; 1 T 1.11Fhe Bakɨme nzan mparav, ana nduara wo vuzvugara, ana won buna vhuueŋ bun suan zav, kha ŋaarar nza nɨɨŋgi. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nza kha gumgi gu mbigi nzan ŋaara vuzvugɨr zav nza Fhe Bakɨmen buna vhuueŋ bun nzuai fhu. Zakɨra fhuvara! Fhe Bakɨme, ana nduara nzan ndavi vheri gari, ana nduara nzan ŋaara vuzvugɨrga.
